curriculum.week1: Web3 Fundamentals - Vad är blockchain, decentralisering, wallets
curriculum.week2: Tokens & Smart Contracts - ERC-20, ERC-721 (NFTs), tokenisering
curriculum.week3: DeFi & DAOs - Decentralized finance, governance tokens
curriculum.week4: Real World Applications - Healthcare, supply chain, identitet
curriculum.week5: Advanced Topics - Layer 2, scalability, patientdata på blockchain
